entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GC commits twice the limit when using large pages #103203
  • AllocationTick event is missing on NativeAOT #103198
  • InvalidProgramException with System.Linq.Expressions and user-defined conditional operators #103197
  • Incorrect local time zone reported on macOS #103196
  • `-p:BaseOutputPath=` doesn't override property on linux #103194
  • Ensure that Microsoft.Extensions.Http.DefaultHttpClientFactory is supporting distributed tracing #103192
  • Code coverage fails on some assemblies #103190

Closed

  • Cancellation on NetworkStream.ReadAsync closes local connection but remote server end-point still seems to be connected #69397
  • [API Proposal]: bool System.Reflection.MetadataReader.TryGetString(StringHandle handle, Span<char> span, out int length); #103169
  • ReadOnlySequence<byte> CopyTo byte array Error #103201
  • NET8.0，Socket，Why can I send so much data continuously #103107
  • SslStream not working with ephemeral keys #103101

PullRequests

Created

  • Optimize relocation counting in DehydratedDataNode.GetData #103202
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup some FEATURE_... ifdefs in the GC #103200
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Micro-optimize type check in GVMDependenciesNode.SearchDynamicDependencies #103199
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete dead code in winwrap.h #103193
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Support IAlternateEqualityComparer with FrozenDictionary/Set #103191
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix a few small leaks by properly freeing the result of g_strsplit #103189
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 5 #103188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing includes for FreeBSD 14 in pal_networkstatistics.c #103187
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • field sequences for boxes #103185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix CET - remove writing to shadow stack #103171
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Migrate more ghashtables to simdhash #102476
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add MIT license header to DotnetProxyTrustManager.java #103165
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] handle box + brtrue/brfalse and box+isinst+unbox.any patterns up front #103052
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove cached cgroup values (#102971) #103166
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add user_events support for the native runtime events #102523
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2469221 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable escape analysis and use in vn #103148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
